summary: Cigarettes are made in Winston-Salem, North Carolina. They are sold in packs of six (6.6 packs) or 12 (12 pack) in the U.S. A pack of 12 packs costs about $2.50. The pack is made of a blend of menthol, tobacco, and paper.
